label: Annotate genome
description: Calls genes and functionally annotate input contig set.

parameters.label: Contig file
parameters.desc: Input set of DNA contigs for annotation

parameters.label: Scientific Name
parameters.desc: Scientific name of genome to be annotated

parameters.label: Genetic Code
parameters.desc: Genetic code used in translation of DNA sequences

parameters.name: genome
parameters.label: Output file
parameters.desc: Name of file the annotated genome will be stored in
